resources.string: "This fun Halloween craft involves transforming a simple paper tube into a spooky Halloween decoration. Perfect for kids of all ages!"

"• Toilet paper tube
• Black and orange construction paper
• Scissors
• Glue
• Googly eyes
• Markers
• Stickers (optional)"

"1. Take the toilet paper tube and cover it with black construction paper using glue.
" + "2. Cut out shapes from the orange construction paper to create pumpkin faces or bats, and glue them onto the tube.
" + "3. Use googly eyes to create a fun spooky look.
" + "4. Add additional decorations like stickers or drawings to personalize your craft.
" + "5. Let it dry, and your spooky Halloween paper tube is ready!"
